description: Embrace the power of Navaratnas with these exquisitely crafted Chakra studs. Each gemstone is carefully selected for its color, clarity, and brilliance, ensuring a piece of heirloom quality. The traditional design combined with the modern stud style makes these earrings versatile and suitable for all ages. Wearing Navaratna jewelry is believed to bring good luck, health, and prosperity.
